messages.message: There are still problems though. The docker daemon seems to hang during the build -- not always the same image, so it's not a problem w/ our dockerfiles. I've been talking to the Crafting folks about it.

@mfichman I will be much helpful if you could help address the restarts happening across services in my current sandbox : https://instabase.sandboxes.site/ide/instabase/balamurugan/dev/?folder=/home/owner/instabase
